Title: Relates to establishing the equine industry assistance act of 2019; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the "equine industry assistance act of 2019"; makes appropriations therefor.
LawCode: Add §23-a, Art 24-A §§291 - 291-d, amd §326, Ag & Mkts L; amd §9-0105, En Con L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, the environmental conservation law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the equine industry assistance act of 2019, including the New York horse grazing program and making an appropriation therefor
